title: Collaborative Mathematical Digital Storytelling Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of elementary mathematical concepts and basic proficiency in mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Students engage in a process where role-play-based digital storytelling enhances math concept application and collaborative skills. Interaction with experts (instructors/TAs) and peer feedback are core components of the learning process

learning_goals: Learners can design storylines using digital content and collaborative scripts to solve given math problems.
Learners can analyze and explain real-life applications of math concepts through interaction with peers and experts.
Learners can comprehensively evaluate co-created storytelling outputs with peers using digital platforms based on assessment criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
